document.full_text: egypt's military command said monday that the ousted president, hosni mubarak, was banned from leaving the country and that it would soon lift a detested emergency law.
document.title: egypt's military confirms travel ban on mubarak
lines_and_colors: egypt's military command said monday that the ousted president, hosni mubarak, was banned from leaving the country and that it would soon lift a detested emergency law.
